title: Charlotte Trade Shows Boost Brand Visibility with Custom Tents
summary: Exhibitors in Charlotte are using custom canopy tents to enhance brand visibility and ROI at trade shows, focusing on flexibility and impact.
charlotte_impact: Highlights innovative marketing strategies used by businesses to maximize their presence and attract customers.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks VP of Business Development
summary: Mosaic Capital Partners, a Charlotte-based private equity firm, is seeking a Vice President of Business Development to expand employee ownership.
charlotte_impact: Indicates growth and investment in employee ownership models within the Charlotte business sector.

title: Florence Airport Sees Passenger Increase Despite Flight Loss
summary: Florence Regional Airport experienced increased passenger traffic in 2025 but lost an American Airlines flight to Charlotte. Potential new flight to D.C.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the dynamics of regional air travel and the importance of securing new routes.

title: Women Charged in Torture and Death of Girl in Charlotte
summary: Three women in Charlotte are accused of torturing and killing a child, keeping her in a dog crate, leading to severe child abuse charges.
charlotte_impact: Addresses a horrific case of child abuse and the urgent need for child protection services.

title: Homeowners Reassessing Selling Times Amid Market Shifts

title: Bowling for Babies Event Raises Funds for Maternal Health

title: Statesville Employees Allege 'Whites Only' Bathroom at Plant

charlotte_impact: Addresses serious allegations of racial discrimination in a public workplace.

title: Cooler Weather and Spotty Rain Forecast for Charlotte
summary: Charlotte area expects cooler temperatures and scattered rain on Sunday, with highs near 50 degrees.

title: Found Child Reunited with Guardians in Charlotte
